short_summary: The Office of The Auditor General of Canada has a requirement for Senior Auditors.
description: The Office of The Auditor General of Canada (OAG) has a requirement for Temporary Help Services and has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers generated from CPSS who are qualified under Stream 8.1, Auditor - Senior.
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal - Senior Auditors
#### Solicitation Number
 387
#### Tender Closing Date
March 30, 2023, 14:00:00
#### Publication Date
March 16, 2023

__Invitation Overview__

The Office of the Auditor General of Canada invites suppliers to submit a proposal in response to this solicitation for the provision of temporary help services to meet the organization's requirements. The services required are those of Senior Auditors.

__Scope of Work__

The work to be performed consists of providing senior-level audit services to support the Office of the Auditor General of Canada's operations. The successful supplier(s) will be required to provide the personnel necessary to meet the organization's requirements.

__Eligibility Requirements__

Suppliers must have the necessary qualifications, experience, and capabilities to provide the required services. To be eligible, suppliers must be registered with Canada Business Network and have successfully completed a supplier assessment.

__Compliance Requirements__

Suppliers must also demonstrate compliance with the following requirements:

* Respect for Canadian laws, regulations, and human rights
* Respect for the privacy and security of the information of the Office of the Auditor General of Canada
* Compliance with the Office of the Auditor General of Canada's policies, procedures, and guidelines

__Evaluation Criteria__

The lowest price will be used as the sole evaluation criterion.

__Request for Proposal Documents__

For additional information regarding the solicitation, please refer to the attached Request for Proposal documents, which include a detailed scope of work, evaluation criteria, and other relevant details.

#### Contact Information

For any questions or concerns regarding this solicitation, please contact:

Heather Warren, Supplier Contact
(613) 859-3143
suppliers@oag-bvg.gc.ca

#### Important Dates

* Tender closing date: March 30, 2023, 14:00:00
* Tender evaluation date: to be determined

### Note

The information provided in this announcement is subject to the terms and conditions of the Request for Proposal documents. By submitting a proposal, the supplier acknowledges that they have read, understood, and agree to be bound by the terms and conditions of the solicitation. __The information contained in this announcement is subject to change without notice.____
